task.title: How to Make a Caramel Latte
task.shortdesc: Ever had a homemade latte? This latte recipe can be made at home without an espresso machine!

step.cmd: Open cabinet and remove coffee grounds and filter.
Place 5 tbsp of coffee grounds in filter, then place the filter in the coffee maker.
Pour 2 cups of water in the spout located at the topc of the coffee maker.
Press the ON button and wait for the coffee to brew.
Pour milk into the jar and fill halfway.
Screw the lid on tightly, and shake the jar as hard as you can until the milk is frothy and has roughly doubled in volume, 30 to 60 seconds.
Microwave the milk and take the lid off the jar and microwave uncovered for 30 seconds.
Pour the coffee into a wide, shallow coffee cup.
Use a large spoon to hold back the milk foam, and pour as much warm milk as you would like into the espresso.
Add foam and spoon as much milk foam as you would like onto your latte.
